#summary API Group
#labels API

= Group =

|| Protocol || HTTP ||
|| Control || OAuth ||
|| Data || JSON ||
|| Access || Group Admin ||

== Properties ==

|| *Name* || *Value* || *Interaction* ||
|| name || Group name || read/write ||
|| redirect || See [API_Redirect Redirect]  || read/write ||
|| margins || See [API_Margins Margins]  || read/write ||
|| identifier  || Group identifier || readonly ||

== Create ==

 Groups are created by the [mailto:cpi@cognitiveprofile.com?Subject=CPI+Groups service administrator]

== Query/Identify ==

{{{
 GET /groups/data.json
}}}
 for response Mime-Type `application/json`
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "03efdbc",
     "name": "Example"
   }
 ]
}}}

== Read/Copy/Test ==

{{{
 GET /groups/03efdbc/data.json
}}}
 for response Mime-Type `application/json`
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "03efdbc",
     "name": "Example",
     "redirect": ?,
     "margins": ?
   }
 ]
}}}

== Update/Modify ==

{{{
 POST /groups/03efdbc/data.json
}}}
 for request and response Mime-Type `application/json`
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "03efdbc",
     "name": "Example",
     "redirect": ?,
     "margins": ?
   }
 ]
}}}

== Redirect ==

 See [API_Redirect Redirect] 

== Margins ==

 See [API_Margins Margins]
